original: Majjhima Nikāya 28
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahāhatthipadopamasutta
analyzed: mahāhatthipadopamasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “āvuso bhikkhave”ti.
analyzed: āvuso bhikkhave ti

original: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa

original: Āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
analyzed: āyasmā sāriputtaḥ etat avoca

original: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṁ pāṇānaṁ padajātāni sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṁ gacchanti, hatthipadaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati yadidaṁ mahantattena;
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso yāni kānici jaṅgalānam pāṇānam pada jātāni sabbāni tāni hatthi pade samodhānam gacchanti hatthi padam tesam aggam akkhāyati yat idam mahanta ttena

original: evameva kho, āvuso, ye keci kusalā dhammā sabbete catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso ye keci kusalāḥ dhammāḥ sabbete catūsu ariya saccesu saṅgaham gacchanti

original: Katamesu catūsu?
analyzed: katamesu catūsu

original: Dukkhe ariyasacce, dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhe ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasacce.
analyzed: dukkhe ariya sacce dukkha samudaye ariya sacce dukkha nirodhe ariya sacce dukkha nirodha gāminiyā paṭipadāya ariya sacce

original: Katamañcāvuso, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca āvuso dukkham ariya sat ca

original: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ; saṅkhittena, pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā.
analyzed: jāti api dukkhā jarā api dukkhā maraṇam api dukkha soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā api dukkhā yam piccham na labhati tam pi dukkha saṅkhittena pañca upādāna khandhāḥ dukkhāḥ

original: Katame cāvuso, pañcupādānakkhandhā?
analyzed: katame ca āvuso pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ

original: Seyyathidaṁ—rūpupādānakkhandho, vedanupādānakkhandho, saññupādānakkhandho, saṅkhārupādānakkhandho, viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
analyzed: seyyathidaṃ rūpa upādānakkhandhaḥ vedanupādānakkhandhaḥ saññu pādānakkhandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādānakkhandhaḥ viññāṇupādānakkhandhaḥ

original: Katamo cāvuso, rūpupādānakkhandho?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca āvuso rūpa upādāna kkhandho

original: Cattāri ca mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya rūpaṁ.
analyzed: cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnam ca mahābhūtānam upādāya

original: Katamā cāvuso, cattāro mahābhūtā?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso cattāraḥ mahābhūtā

original: Pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu, vāyodhātu.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyaḥ dhātu

original: Katamā cāvuso, pathavīdhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso pathavī dhātu

original: Pathavīdhātu siyā ajjhattikā, siyā bāhirā.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu siyā ajjhattikā siyā bāhirā

original: Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso ajjhattikā pathavī dhātu

original: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ kakkhaḷaṁ kharigataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yam ajjhattam paccattam kakkhaḷam khari gatam

original: kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṁsaṁ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṁ vakkaṁ hadayaṁ yakanaṁ
analyzed: kesāḥ lomā nakhāḥ dantāḥ tacaḥ masam nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjam vakkam hadayam

original: kilomakaṁ pihakaṁ papphāsaṁ antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariyaṁ karīsaṁ, yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci
analyzed: kilomakam pihakam papphāsam antam anta guṇam udariyam yam vā pana aññam pi kiñci

original: ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ kakkhaḷaṁ kharigataṁ upādinnaṁ.
analyzed: ajjhattam paccattam kakkhaḷam khari gatam upādinna

original: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati āvuso ajjhattikā pathavī dhātu

original: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu, yā ca bāhirā pathavīdhātu, pathavīdhāturevesā.
analyzed: yā ca iva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavī dhātu yā ca bāhirā pathavī dhātu pathavī dhātuḥ eva isā

original: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti—evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: tam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā ati evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba

original: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā pathavīdhātuyā nibbindati, pathavīdhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
analyzed: evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya disvā pathavī dhātuyā nibbindati pathavī dhātuyā cittam virājeti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā āpodhātu pakuppati.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam bāhirā āpodhātu pakuppati

original: Antarahitā tasmiṁ samaye bāhirā pathavīdhātu hoti.
analyzed: antarahitā tasmin samaye bāhirā pathavī dhātu

original: Tassā hi nāma, āvuso, bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati, vipariṇāmadhammatā paññāyissati.
analyzed: tassāḥ hi nāma āvuso bāhirāya pathavī dhātuyā tāva mahallikāya anicca tā paññāyissati khaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vipariṇāma dhamma tā paññāyissati

original: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā? Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti.
analyzed: kim panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmi iti vā atha khvā assa na utevettha hoti

original: Tañce, āvuso, bhikkhuṁ pare akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti, so evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: tat ce āvuso bhikkhum pare akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘uppannā kho me ayaṁ sotasamphassajā dukkhavedanā.
analyzed: uppannā kho me ayam sota samphassa jā dukkha vedanā

original: Sā ca kho paṭicca, no apaṭicca.
analyzed: sā ca kho paṭicca no a paṭicca

original: Kiṁ paṭicca?
analyzed: kim paṭicca

original: Phassaṁ paṭicca’.
analyzed: phassam paṭicca

original: So phasso aniccoti passati, vedanā aniccāti passati, saññā aniccāti passati, saṅkhārā aniccāti passati, viññāṇaṁ aniccanti passati.
analyzed: so phassaḥ aniccaḥ ti passati vedanā aniccā ati passati saññā aniccā ati passati saṅkhārāḥ aniccāḥ ati passati viññāṇam aniccanti passati

original: Tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa dhātā ārammaṇam eva cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: Tañce, āvuso, bhikkhuṁ pare aniṭṭhehi akantehi amanāpehi samudācaranti—
analyzed: tat ce āvuso bhikkhum pare aniṭṭhehi a kantehi a manāpehi samudācaranti

original: pāṇisamphassenapi leḍḍusamphassenapi daṇḍasamphassenapi satthasamphassenapi.
analyzed: pāṇi samphassena api leḍḍu samphassena api daṇḍa samphassena api sattha samphassena api

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘tathābhūto kho ayaṁ kāyo yathābhūtasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamanti, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamanti, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamanti, satthasamphassāpi kamanti.
analyzed: tathābhūtaḥ kho ayam kāyaḥ yathābhūtasmin kāye pāṇi samphassā api kamanti leḍḍu samphassā api kamanti daṇḍa samphassā api kamanti sattha samphassā api kamanti

original: Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā kakacūpamovāde:
analyzed: vuttam kho pana itam bhagavatā kakacūpama uvāde

original: “ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṁ, tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti.
analyzed: ubhatodaṇḍakena ce pi bhikkhave kakacena corāḥ ocarakāḥ aṅgam aṅgāni tatra api yaḥ manaḥ padūseyya na me saḥ tena sāsana karoti

original: Āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: āraddham kho pana me vīriyam bhavissati a sallīna upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: Kāmaṁ dāni imasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamantu, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamantu, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamantu, satthasamphassāpi kamantu, karīyati hidaṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanan’ti.
analyzed: kāmam dāni imasmin kāye pāṇi samphassā api kamantu leḍḍu samphassā api kamantu daṇḍa samphassā api kamantu sattha samphassā api kamantu karīyati hi dam buddhānam sāsanam ti

original: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: tassa ce āvuso bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti

original: So tena saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
analyzed: saḥ tena sa vijjati sa vegam āpajjati

original: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ,
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me su laddha

original: yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato, upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātī’ti.
analyzed: yassa me evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti iti

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, suṇisā sasuraṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api āvuso su nisā sa suram disvā sa vijjati sa vegam āpajjati

original: evameva kho, āvuso, tassa ce bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato,
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso tassa ce bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ

original: evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato, upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhāti, so tena saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
analyzed: evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti saḥ tena savijjati sa vegam āpajjati

original: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ, yassa
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me yassa

original: me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato, upekkhā
analyzed: me evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā

original: kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātī’ti.
analyzed: kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti iti

original: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti, so tena attamano hoti.
analyzed: tassa ce āvuso bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā saṇṭhāti saḥ tena atta manaḥ hoti

original: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā api kho āvuso bhikkhunaḥ bahu katam hoti

original: Katamā cāvuso, āpodhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso āpaḥ dhātu

original: Āpodhātu siyā ajjhattikā, siyā bāhirā.
analyzed: āpodhātu siyā ajjhattikā siyā bāhirā

original: Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā āpodhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso ajjhattikā āpodhātu

original: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ āpo āpogataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yam ajjhattam paccattam āpaḥ āpogatam

original: pittaṁ semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttaṁ, yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ āpo āpogataṁ upādinnaṁ—
analyzed: pittam semham pubbaḥ lohitam sedaḥ medaḥ assu vasā kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā lasikā mutta yam vā pana aññam pi kiñci ajjhattam paccattam āpaḥ āpogatam upādinna

original: ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā āpodhātu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati āvuso ajjhattikā āpodhātu

original: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā āpodhātu yā ca bāhirā āpodhātu, āpodhāturevesā.
analyzed: yā ca iva kho pana ajjhattikā āpodhātu yā ca bāhirā āpodhātu āpodhātuḥ eva isā

original: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: tam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā ati evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba

original: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā āpodhātuyā nibbindati, āpodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
analyzed: evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya disvā āpodhātuyā nibbindati āpodhātuyā cittam virājeti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā āpodhātu pakuppati.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam bāhirā āpodhātu pakuppati

original: Sā gāmampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati.
analyzed: sā gāmam pi vahati nigamam pi vahati nagaram pi vahati janapadam pi vahati janapada padesam pi vahati

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde yojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, dviyojanasatikānipi
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam mahā samudde yojana satikāni api udakāni ogacchanti dvi yojana satikāni api

original: udakāni ogacchanti, tiyojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, catuyojanasatikānipi udakāni
analyzed: udakāni ogacchanti udakāni ogacchanti catur yojana satikāni api udakāni

original: ogacchanti, pañcayojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, chayojanasatikānipi udakāni
analyzed: ogacchanti pañca yojana satikāni api udakāni ogacchanti cha yojana satikāni api udakāni

original: ogacchanti, sattayojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti.
analyzed: ogacchanti satta yojana satikāni pi udakāni ogacchanti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde sattatālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, chattālampi
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam mahā samudde satta tālam pi udakam saṇṭhāti chattālam pi

original: udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, pañcatālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, catuttālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, titālampi
analyzed: udakam saṇṭhāti pañca tālam pi udakam saṇṭhāti catur tālam pi udakam saṇṭhāti ti tālam pi

original: udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, dvitālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, tālamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: udakam saṇṭhāti dvi tālam pi udakam saṇṭhāti tāla mattam pi udakam saṇṭhāti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde sattaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, chapporisampi
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam mahā samudde satta porisam pi udakam saṇṭhāti chapporisam pi

original: udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, pañcaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, catupporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti,
analyzed: udakam saṇṭhāti pañcaporisam pi udakam saṇṭhāti catupporisam pi udakam saṇṭhāti

original: tiporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, dviporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, porisamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: ti porisam pi udakam saṇṭhāti dvi porisam pi udakam saṇṭhāti porisa mattam pi udakam saṇṭhāti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde aḍḍhaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, kaṭimattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, jāṇukamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, gopphakamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam mahā samudde aḍḍha porisam pi udakam saṇṭhāti kaṭi mattam pi udakam saṇṭhāti jāṇuka mattam pi udakam saṇṭhāti gopphaka mattam pi udakam saṇṭhāti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo, yaṁ mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṁ na hoti.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam mahā samudde aṅguli pabbata emana mattam pi udakam na hoti

original: Tassā hi nāma, āvuso, bāhirāya āpodhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati, vipariṇāmadhammatā paññāyissati.
analyzed: tassāḥ hi nāma āvuso bāhirāya āpodhātuyāḥ tāva mahallikāya anicca tā paññāyissati khaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vipariṇāma dhamma tā paññāyissati

original: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā? Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti …pe…
analyzed: kim panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmi iti vā atha khvā assa na utevettha hoti pe

original: tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti. So tena attamano hoti.
analyzed: tassa ce āvuso bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā saṇṭhāti saḥ tena atta manaḥ hoti

original: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā api kho āvuso bhikkhunaḥ bahu katam hoti

original: Katamā cāvuso, tejodhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso tejaḥ dhātu

original: Tejodhātu siyā ajjhattikā, siyā bāhirā.
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu siyā ajjhattikā siyā bāhirā

original: Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā tejodhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso ajjhattikā tejaḥ dhātu

original: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ tejo tejogataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yam ajjhattam paccattam tejaḥ tejaḥ gatam

original: yena ca santappati, yena ca jīrīyati, yena ca pariḍayhati, yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṁ
analyzed: yena ca santappati yena ca jīrīyati yena ca pariḍayhati yena ca asita pīta khāyita sāyita

original: sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchati, yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ tejo tejogataṁ upādinnaṁ—
analyzed: sammā pariṇāmam gacchati yam vā pana aññam pi kiñci ajjhattam paccattam tejaḥ tejaḥ gatam

original: ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā tejodhātu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati āvuso ajjhattikā tejaḥ dhātu

original: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā tejodhātu yā ca bāhirā tejodhātu, tejodhāturevesā.
analyzed: yā ca iva kho pana ajjhattikā tejodhātu yā ca bāhirā tejodhātu tejodhātuḥ eva isā

original: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: tam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā ati evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba

original: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā tejodhātuyā nibbindati, tejodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
analyzed: evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya disvā tejaḥ dhātuyā nibbindati tejaḥ dhātuyā cittam virājeti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā tejodhātu pakuppati.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam bāhirā tejaḥ dhātu pakuppati

original: Sā gāmampi dahati, nigamampi dahati, nagarampi dahati, janapadampi dahati, janapadapadesampi dahati.
analyzed: sā gāmam pi dahati nigamam pi dahati nagaram pi dahati janapadam pi dahati janapada padesam pi dahati

original: Sā haritantaṁ vā panthantaṁ vā selantaṁ vā udakantaṁ vā ramaṇīyaṁ vā bhūmibhāgaṁ āgamma anāhārā nibbāyati.
analyzed: sā haritantam vā panthantam vā selantam vā udakantam vā ramaṇīyam vā bhūmi bhāgam āgamma anāhārā nibbāyati

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kukkuṭapattenapi nhārudaddulenapi aggiṁ gavesanti.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam kukkuṭapattena api nhārudaddulena api aggim gavesanti

original: Tassā hi nāma, āvuso, bāhirāya tejodhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati, vipariṇāmadhammatā paññāyissati.
analyzed: tassāḥ hi nāma āvuso bāhirāya tejaḥ dhātuyā tāva mahallikāya anicca tā paññāyissati khaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vipariṇāma dhamma tā paññāyissati

original: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā?
analyzed: kim panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmi iti vā

original: Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti …pe… tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato
analyzed: atha khvā assa notevettha hoti pe tassa ce āvuso bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ

original: evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti, so tena attamano hoti.
analyzed: evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā saṇṭhāti saḥ tena atta manaḥ hoti

original: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā api kho āvuso bhikkhunaḥ bahu katam hoti

original: Katamā cāvuso, vāyodhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca avusaḥ vāyodhātu

original: Vāyodhātu siyā ajjhattikā, siyā bāhirā.
analyzed: vāyodhātu siyā ajjhattikā siyā bāhirā

original: Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā vāyodhātu?
analyzed: katamā ca āvuso ajjhattikā vāyodhātu

original: Yaṁ ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ vāyo vāyogataṁ upādinnaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yam ajjhattam paccattam vāyo vāyogatam

original: uddhaṅgamā vātā, adhogamā vātā, kucchisayā vātā, koṭṭhāsayā vātā, aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā, assāso passāso iti, yaṁ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṁ paccattaṁ vāyo vāyogataṁ upādinnaṁ—
analyzed: uddhaṅgamāḥ vātāḥ adhogamāḥ vātāḥ kucchisayāḥ vātā koṭṭhāsayāḥ vātāḥ aṅgam aṅga anusārino vātāḥ assāsaḥ passāsaḥ iti yam vā pana aññam pi kiñci ajjhattam paccattam vāyo vāyogatam upādinna

original: ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā vāyodhātu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati āvuso ajjhattikā vāyodhātu

original: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā vāyodhātu, yā ca bāhirā vāyodhātu, vāyodhāturevesā.
analyzed: yā ca iva kho pana ajjhattikā vāyodhātu yā ca bāhirā vāyodhātu vāyodhātuḥ eva isā

original: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama nesohamasmi na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: tam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā ati evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba

original: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā vāyodhātuyā nibbindati vāyodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
analyzed: evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya disvā vāyodhātuyā nibbindati vāyodhātuyā cittam virājeti

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā vāyodhātu pakuppati.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam bāhirā vāyodhātu pakuppati

original: Sā gāmampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati.
analyzed: sā gāmam pi vahati nigamam pi vahati nagaram pi vahati janapadam pi vahati janapada padesam pi vahati

original: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ gimhānaṁ pacchime māse tālavaṇṭenapi vidhūpanenapi vātaṁ pariyesanti, ossavanepi tiṇāni na icchanti.
analyzed: hoti kho saḥ āvuso samayaḥ yam gimhānam pacchime māse tālavaṇṭena api vidhūpanena api vātam pariyesanti ossavane pi tiṇāni na icchanti

original: Tassā hi nāma, āvuso, bāhirāya vāyodhātuyā tāva mahallikāya aniccatā paññāyissati, khayadhammatā paññāyissati, vayadhammatā paññāyissati, vipariṇāmadhammatā paññāyissati.
analyzed: tassāḥ hi nāma āvuso bāhirāya vāyaḥ dhātuyā tāva mahallikāya anicca tā paññāyissati khaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vaya dhamma tā paññāyissati vipariṇāma dhamma tā paññāyissati

original: Kiṁ panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ‘ahanti vā mamanti vā asmī’ti vā? Atha khvāssa notevettha hoti.
analyzed: kim panimassa mattaṭṭhakassa kāyassa taṇhupādinnassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmi iti vā atha khvā assa na utevettha hoti

original: Tañce, āvuso, bhikkhuṁ pare akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti.
analyzed: tam ce āvuso bhikkhum pare akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti

original: So evaṁ pajānāti, uppannā kho me ayaṁ sotasamphassajā dukkhā vedanā.
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti uppannā kho me ayam sota samphassa jā dukkhā vedanā

original: Sā ca kho paṭicca, no apaṭicca.
analyzed: sā ca kho paṭicca no a paṭicca

original: Kiṁ paṭicca?
analyzed: kim paṭicca

original: Phassaṁ paṭicca.
analyzed: phassam paṭicca

original: Sopi phasso aniccoti passati, vedanā aniccāti passati, saññā aniccāti passati, saṅkhārā aniccāti passati, viññāṇaṁ aniccanti passati.
analyzed: saḥ api phassaḥ aniccaḥ ti passati vedanā aniccā ati passati saññā aniccā ati passati saṅkhārāḥ aniccāḥ ati passati viññāṇam aniccanti passati

original: Tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa dhātā ārammaṇam eva cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: Tañce, āvuso, bhikkhuṁ pare aniṭṭhehi akantehi amanāpehi samudācaranti, pāṇisamphassenapi leḍḍusamphassenapi daṇḍasamphassenapi satthasamphassenapi.
analyzed: tam ce āvuso bhikkhum pare aniṭṭhehi akantehi amanāpehi samudācaranti pāṇi samphassena api leḍḍu samphassena api daṇḍa samphassena api sattha samphassena api

original: So evaṁ pajānāti ‘tathābhūto kho ayaṁ kāyo yathābhūtasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamanti, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamanti, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamanti, satthasamphassāpi kamanti.
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti tathābhūtaḥ kho ayam kāyaḥ yathābhūtasmin kāye pāṇi samphassā api kamanti leḍḍu samphassā api kamanti daṇḍa samphassā api kamanti sattha samphassā api kamanti

original: Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā kakacūpamovāde “ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṁ. Tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti.
analyzed: vuttam khaḥ pana itam bhagavatā kakaca upama uvāde ubhatodaṇḍakena ce ipi bhikkhave kakacena corāḥ ocarakāḥ aṅgam aṅgāni tatra api yaḥ manaḥ padūseyya na me saḥ tena sāsana karoti

original: Āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: āraddham kho pana me vīriyam bhavissati a sallīna upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: Kāmaṁ dāni imasmiṁ kāye pāṇisamphassāpi kamantu, leḍḍusamphassāpi kamantu, daṇḍasamphassāpi kamantu, satthasamphassāpi kamantu. Karīyati hidaṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanan’ti.
analyzed: kāmam dāni imasmin kāye pāṇi samphassā api kamantu leḍḍu samphassā api kamantu daṇḍa samphassā api kamantu sattha samphassā api kamantu karīyati hi dam buddhānam sāsanam ti

original: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: tassa ce āvuso bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti

original: So tena saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
analyzed: saḥ tena sa vijjati sa vegam āpajjati

original: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ.
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me su laddha

original: Yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātī’ti.
analyzed: yassa me evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti iti

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, suṇisā sasuraṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api āvuso su nisā sa suram disvā sa vijjati sa vegam āpajjati

original: evameva kho, āvuso, tassa ce bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato, upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso tassa ce bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti

original: So tena saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
analyzed: saḥ tena sa vijjati sa vegam āpajjati

original: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ.
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me su laddha

original: Yassa me evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato, upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātī’ti.
analyzed: yassa me evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā na saṇṭhāti iti

original: Tassa ce, āvuso, bhikkhuno evaṁ buddhaṁ anussarato, evaṁ dhammaṁ anussarato, evaṁ saṅghaṁ anussarato, upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhāti, so tena attamano hoti.
analyzed: tassa ce āvuso bhikkhuno evam buddham anussarataḥ evam dhammam anussarataḥ evam saṅgham anussarataḥ upekkhā kusala nissitā saṇṭhāti saḥ tena atta manaḥ hoti

original: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā api kho āvuso bhikkhunaḥ bahu katam hoti

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kaṭṭhañca paṭicca valliñca paṭicca tiṇañca paṭicca mattikañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito agārantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso kaṭṭham ca paṭicca valliñca paṭicca tiṇam ca paṭicca mattikam ca paṭicca ākāsaḥ parivāritaḥ saṅkham gacchati

original: evameva kho, āvuso, aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṁsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca masañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāsaḥ parivāritaḥ rūpam tu eva saṅkham gacchati

original: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca iva āvuso cakkhum a paribhinnam hoti bāhirā ca rūpā na āpātham āgacchanti no ca tajjaḥ samannāhāro hoti na iva tāva tajjassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca iva āvuso cakkhum a paribhinnam hoti bāhirā ca rūpā āpātham āgacchanti no ca tad jo samannāhāraḥ hoti na iva tāva tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattikañceva cakkhuṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti, bāhirā ca rūpā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti. Evaṁ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: yatas ca kho āvuso ajjhattikam ca iva cakkhum a paribhinnam hoti bāhirā ca rūpā āpātham āgacchanti tad jo ca samannāhāraḥ hoti evam tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Yaṁ tathābhūtassa rūpaṁ taṁ rūpupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati, yā tathābhūtassa
analyzed: yam tathābhūtassa rūpam tam rūpa upādāna kkhandhe saṅgaham gacchati yā tathābhūtassa

original: vedanā sā vedanupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati, yā tathābhūtassa saññā sā saññupādānakkhandhe
analyzed: vedanā sā vedanā upādāna kkhandhe saṅgaham gacchati yā tathābhūtassa saññā sā saññā upādāna kkhandhe

original: saṅgahaṁ gacchati, ye tathābhūtassa saṅkhārā te saṅkhārupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati ye tathābhūtassa saṅkhārā te saṅkhāra upādāna khandhe saṅgaham gacchanti

original: yaṁ tathābhūtassa viññāṇaṁ taṁ viññāṇupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yam tathābhūtassa viññāṇam tam viññāṇa upādāna khandhe saṅgaham gacchati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘evañhi kira imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ saṅgaho sannipāto samavāyo hoti.
analyzed: evam hi kira imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam saṅgahaḥ sannipātaḥ samavāyaḥ hoti

original: Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā:
analyzed: vuttam kho pana itam bhagavatā

original: “yo paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passati so dhammaṁ passati;
analyzed: yaḥ paṭiccasamuppādam passati so dhammam passati

original: yo dhammaṁ passati so paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ dhammam passati so paṭiccasamuppādam passati iti

original: Paṭiccasamuppannā kho panime yadidaṁ pañcupādānakkhandhā.
analyzed: paṭicca samuppannā kho panime yat idam pañca upādāna khandhā

original: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chando ālayo anunayo ajjhosānaṁ so dukkhasamudayo.
analyzed: yaḥ imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chandaḥ ālayaḥ anunayaḥ ajjhosānam saḥ dukkha samudayo

original: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, so dukkhanirodho’ti.
analyzed: yaḥ imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chanda rāga vinayaḥ chanda rāga ppahāna saḥ dukkha nirodho ti

original: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā api kho āvuso bhikkhunaḥ bahu katam hoti

original: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, sotaṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti …pe…
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca iva āvuso sotam a paribhinnam hoti pe

original: ghānaṁ aparibhinnaṁ hoti …
analyzed: ghānam a paribhinnam hoti

original: jivhā aparibhinnā hoti …
analyzed: jivhā a paribhinnā hoti

original: kāyo aparibhinno hoti …
analyzed: kāyaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti

original: mano aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca dhammā na āpāthaṁ āgacchanti no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: manaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirā ca dhammā na āpātham āgacchanti no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti na iva tāva tajjassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Ajjhattiko ceva, āvuso, mano aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca dhammā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti, neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: ajjhattikaḥ ca iva āvuso manaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirā ca dhammā āpātham āgacchanti no ca tajjo samannāhāro hoti na iva tāva tajjassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Yato ca kho, āvuso, ajjhattiko ceva mano aparibhinno hoti, bāhirā ca dhammā āpāthaṁ āgacchanti, tajjo ca samannāhāro hoti, evaṁ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: yatas ca kho āvuso ajjhattikaḥ ca iva manaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirā ca dhammā āpātham āgacchanti tad jo ca samannāhāraḥ hoti evam tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Yaṁ tathābhūtassa rūpaṁ taṁ rūpupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati, yā tathābhūtassa
analyzed: yam tathābhūtassa rūpam tam rūpa upādāna kkhandhe saṅgaham gacchati yā tathābhūtassa

original: vedanā sā vedanupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati, yā tathābhūtassa saññā sā saññupādānakkhandhe
analyzed: vedanā sā vedanā upādāna kkhandhe saṅgaham gacchati yā tathābhūtassa saññā sā saññā upādāna kkhandhe

original: saṅgahaṁ gacchati, ye tathābhūtassa saṅkhārā te saṅkhārupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati ye tathābhūtassa saṅkhārā te saṅkhāra upādāna khandhe saṅgaham gacchanti

original: yaṁ tathābhūtassa viññāṇaṁ taṁ viññāṇupādānakkhandhe saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yam tathābhūtassa viññāṇam tam viññāṇa upādāna khandhe saṅgaham gacchati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘evañhi kira imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ saṅgaho sannipāto samavāyo hoti.
analyzed: evam hi kira imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam saṅgahaḥ sannipātaḥ samavāyaḥ hoti

original: Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā:
analyzed: vuttam kho pana itam bhagavatā

original: “yo paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passati so dhammaṁ passati;
analyzed: yaḥ paṭiccasamuppādam passati so dhammam passati

original: yo dhammaṁ passati so paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ dhammam passati so paṭiccasamuppādam passati iti

original: Paṭiccasamuppannā kho panime yadidaṁ pañcupādānakkhandhā.
analyzed: paṭicca samuppannā kho panime yat idam pañca upādāna khandhā

original: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chando ālayo anunayo ajjhosānaṁ so dukkhasamudayo.
analyzed: yaḥ imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chandaḥ ālayaḥ anunayaḥ ajjhosānam saḥ dukkha samudayo

original: Yo imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ so dukkhanirodho’ti.
analyzed: yaḥ imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu chanda rāga vinayaḥ chanda rāga ppahānam saḥ dukkha nirodho ti

original: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno bahukataṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: ettāvatā api kho āvuso bhikkhunaḥ bahu katam hoti iti

original: Idamavoca āyasmā sāriputto.
analyzed: idam avocaḥ āyasmā sāriputto

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: mahāhatthipadopama suttam niṭṭhitam aṭṭhama
